events.title: AI Hackathon 2025
events.description: Join us for a 48-hour hackathon focused on building innovative AI solutions. Teams will compete to create the most impactful AI applications using cutting-edge technologies.
events.rules:
1. Teams of 2-5 members
2. All code must be written during the hackathon
3. Use of open-source libraries is allowed
4. Projects must be submitted by the deadline
5. Teams must present their projects to judges

events.title: Machine Learning Challenge
events.description: A month-long challenge to develop machine learning models for real-world problems. Participants will work on datasets provided by industry partners and compete to achieve the highest accuracy.
events.rules:
1. Individual participation only
2. Must use provided datasets
3. Weekly submissions required
4. Models will be evaluated on test data
5. Code must be well-documented

events.title: Data Science Competition
events.description: Compete in this intensive data science competition where participants will analyze complex datasets, create predictive models, and present their findings to a panel of industry experts.
events.rules:
1. Teams of 1-3 members
2. Must use Python or R
3. Solutions must be reproducible
4. Final presentation required
5. Code and methodology must be original

events.title: Deep Learning Workshop
events.description: An intensive two-day workshop covering the fundamentals of deep learning, neural networks, and practical implementation using popular frameworks. Led by industry experts with hands-on exercises.
events.rules:
1. Basic Python knowledge required
2. Bring your own laptop
3. Pre-workshop setup instructions must be completed
4. Attendance required for both days
5. Certificate provided upon completion
